sentences.en: Below are printed the answers to the Brain of Soccer 1993 quiz.
sentences.cn: 以下所印的是1993年“脑力足球”小测验的答案。

sentences.en: Brazilian soccer boss Carlos Parreira hit out angrily last night after his side were barred from training at Wembley.
sentences.cn: 昨晚巴西足球队主帅卡洛斯·佩雷拉因球队被禁止在温布利球场训练而大发雷霆。

sentences.en: Burkoth lettered in soccer.
sentences.cn: 伯考思在足球上获得了佩戴校名首字母标志的荣誉。

sentences.en: But now, my hobbies are sports, like soccer and swimming.
sentences.cn: 但是现在我的爱好是体育，比如足球和游泳。

sentences.en: France and Spain will meet in the soccer cup final.
sentences.cn: 法国队和西班牙队将在足球锦标赛决赛中交锋。

sentences.en: He called Moore "one of the immortals of soccer".
sentences.cn: 他把摩尔称作“足球伟人之一”。

sentences.en: He can play tennis, badminton, golf, soccer, anything.
sentences.cn: 什么网球啊, 羽毛球啊, 高尔夫球啊, 足球啊,他都会.

sentences.en: He makes a religion of watching soccer.
sentences.cn: 足球比赛他每场必看.

sentences.en: I don't like playing soccer.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢踢足球.

sentences.en: I never play soccer.
sentences.cn: 我从来不踢足球。

sentences.en: I play soccer in my free time.
sentences.cn: 我空闲时会踢足球.

sentences.en: I played semi-professional soccer for Walsall.
sentences.cn: 我作为半职业球员为沃尔索尔队踢过球。

sentences.en: In soccer, only the goal - keeper may play the ball with his hands.
sentences.cn: 在足球运动中只有守门员可以用手触球.

sentences.en: It must be one of those soccer scarfs from England.
sentences.cn: 那一定是某个英国足球队的围巾。

sentences.en: Mark was mainly interested in sport at school, playing rugby as well as soccer.
sentences.cn: 在学校，马克主要对体育运动很感兴趣，他打橄榄球，也踢足球。

sentences.en: Next to bullfights and soccer, lotteries are Spain's biggest sport.
sentences.cn: 除了斗牛和足球以外, 彩票是西班牙最热门的玩意儿.

sentences.en: Rotate your team captain – all young soccer players like to be captain for a day.
sentences.cn: 球队队长轮流制--所有的年轻足球运动员都想有一天能成为队长。

sentences.en: Shall we play soccer?
sentences.cn: 我们踢足球好吗？

sentences.en: The Zambian game is much more aggressive than European soccer.
sentences.cn: 赞比亚的这种运动比欧式足球要激烈得多。

sentences.en: Violence, on the field and in the stands, dogged soccer's heels.
sentences.cn: 赛场上动作粗野,看台上行凶斗殴的现象却在足球比赛时连连发生.

sentences.en: We produced the best soccer of the tournament. Nobody would argue with that.
sentences.cn: 本届比赛中我们踢出了最漂亮的足球，谁都不会否认这一点。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 足球妈妈；非常重视小孩休闲活动，亲自开车接送小孩参加运动，活动的母亲

trans.tran_en: a sport played by two teams of 11 players, who try to kick a round ball into their opponents’  goal
